about_the_game:
A tower rises in the clouds, floating in a distant realm. And you've come a long way, driven by curiosity.

A short and challenging 2D platformer that will test your skills. Master the pogo technique and climb through the different areas to reach the top of the tower, where its creator awaits.

  • Interact with the strange creatures that inhabit the place.

  • Find all the medallions - will they be of any use?

  • Discover the secrets of the tower.

FREE!

The Pogo Witch has been developed by me alone, except for the amazing music by Dan Espinosa (Dan_trvlr).

I decided to offer it for free, as it's my first big project and I want everyone to enjoy it, to use it as a portfolio and to share what I'm passionate about.
detailed_description:
A tower rises in the clouds, floating in a distant realm. And you've come a long way, driven by curiosity.

A short and challenging 2D platformer that will test your skills. Master the pogo technique and climb through the different areas to reach the top of the tower, where its creator awaits.

  • Interact with the strange creatures that inhabit the place.

  • Find all the medallions - will they be of any use?

  • Discover the secrets of the tower.

FREE!

The Pogo Witch has been developed by me alone, except for the amazing music by Dan Espinosa (Dan_trvlr).

I decided to offer it for free, as it's my first big project and I want everyone to enjoy it, to use it as a portfolio and to share what I'm passionate about.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: The Pogo Witch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A short and challenging 2D platformer that will test your skills. Master the pogo technique and climb through the different areas to reach the top of the tower.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
